text: The Best of Celine Dion is a greatest hits album by Canadian singer Celine Dion. == Track listing == ==Release history== Region Date Label Format Catalog France, Spain June 1988 Carrere CD 96-545 Vinyl record 66-545 Cassette 76-545 Germany CD CAR 8 26833 Vinyl record CAR 6 26833 Cassette CAR 4 26833 Denmark, Switzerland Mega CD MRCD 3314 Vinyl record MRLP 3314 Cassette MRMC 3314 ==Other websites == * * Category:Celine Dion albums Category:Greatest hits albums Category:1988 albums
